General.Name: Royal Plus PCL
General.Description: Royal Plus Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of beverages, fruit juices, fruit juices with basil seeds, fruit juices with chia seeds, coconut milk, and soy milk. It operates in Thailand, the United States, China, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 84/3-7 Rama II Soi 69, Bangkok, Thailand, 10150
